text: @narendramodi Sir,I m live in delhi,india. My sister nd her husband has been working in #Netherlands in #chetuindiapvtltd and because of this #covid19 they both were suffering from the fear of getting engaged with #CoronaVirus.They want to coming back to india please  do something sir
